titles: His Majesties speech to the gentlemen at Yorke on Thursday last, being the 12. of May, 1642.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
publisher: First printed at Yorke, and now reprinted at London,
notes: Originally published as His Majesties speech to the gentry of the county of Yorke.
Reproduction of the original in the Caius and Gonville College Library (Cambridge University).
keywords: Hotham, John, --  Sir, d. 1645 Jan. 2 --  Early works to 1800.
Prerogative, Royal --  England --  Early works to 1800.
